name: Palafin
description: The Dolphin Pokémon. This Pokémon changes its appearance if it hears its allies calling for help. Palafin will never show anybody its moment of transformation.

abilities.name: Zero to Hero
abilities.description: When a non-Pokémon ally of Palafin takes damage from a source outside that ally's control, Palafin may enter its Hero Form. In Hero Form, Palafin's size changes to Medium, its AC increases by 4, and each of its STR and DEX scores increase by 4, up to a maximum of 22. It may do this once per long rest. It reverts to normal form at the end of combat.
